page.title: 11Engineering,Horticulture
page.content: There is a tremendous variety of employment in the area. An interesting feature is that most local employers are small or family run businesses.Farming, both mixed and poultry and horticulture in the form of plant nurseries and a mushroom farm are found in the area but are discussed in detail elsewhere.Other types of employment are woodturning and joinery at Forton, light engineering on Snapewood Lane,car repairs and petrol sales in various garages along the A6.Agricultural contractors and machinery salesmen also have premises locally.Catering in restaurants,cafes and public houses is found in and around Scorton.Small shops are found in Scorton or attached to the occasional garage.Finally there are many people who live in the area but work elsewhere.
